this is the strangest problem i've seen
if you change the name of the construcotr param 'elements' to anything that has 
8 characters - you get the exception

otherwiese - no exception

This one also drove me crazy for almost a year. But now it's fixed!

The problem was that the search engine included trailing spaces in a constructor
reference. The NodeFinder then resolved the match to the *enclosing* method
invocation node ...

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 74035 ***
